subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Kei Nishikori battled through another five-set match, defeating Stan Wawrinka and becoming the first Japanese man to make a semifinal of the United States championships since 1918.
snippet: Kei Nishikori battled through another five-set match, defeating Stan Wawrinka and becoming the first Japanese man to make a semifinal of the United States championships since 1918.
